CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 挥手问候；招手；挥手示意（方向）；挥臂；用手传递信号；（一端固定地）飘扬；飘动；摇晃；起伏；使呈波浪形状；使卷曲；摆动；使波纹般移动；使起伏动态；使摇曳动态；使…略呈波形
波浪；波涛；大海；风潮；心潮；电磁波；汹涌的态势；（人群的）齐声欢呼；（运动场上观众的）人浪；（一连串相关事件的）连绵；（一批接一批的）人群（或事物）

synonym.mean: 波动；起伏；挥手示意；摇动；呈波形
卷发；向…挥手示意；使成波浪形
波动；波浪；高潮；挥手示意；卷曲

word_mean_info__list.difference: 词义较模糊，泛指巨浪、波涛或作比喻使用。
普通用词，指水面上移动的任何具有峰谷皱形的波动，尤指距离相等的波浪，也比喻任何类似的物体。
多指微风吹过水面或石头投入水中所激起的涟漪或细浪。

word_group.brief_definition: 咋咋呼呼, 大肆张扬；产生巨大影响；兴风作浪, 引起麻烦

bilingual.source: Yes, it was there, slowly rolling beneath him like a mighty black wave.
bilingual.target: 是的，它在那里，像一股强大的黑色波浪一样在他下面缓缓滚动。

bilingual.source: A ripple of applause starts at the back of the room and rolls forward like a wave.
bilingual.target: 一阵掌声从房间后面开始，像波浪一样向前滚动。

bilingual.source: The amplitude of this wave is very small.
The scientist measured the wave at 50 hertz.
bilingual.target: 科学家测量了50赫兹的波。

bilingual.source: Engineers are working on electromagnetic wave technology.
bilingual.target: 工程师们正在研究电磁的波技术。

bilingual.source: The discovery ignited a new wave of scientific research.
bilingual.target: 这一发现点燃了新一波的科学研究。

bilingual.source: The movie unleashed a wave of nostalgia among the audience.
bilingual.target: 这部电影在观众中释放了一波怀旧情绪。

bilingual.source: The study of diffraction is essential in understanding wave behavior.
bilingual.target: 研究衍射对于理解波的行为至关重要。

bilingual.source: In physics, lambda represents the wavelength of a wave.
bilingual.target: 在物理学中，lambda（希腊字母λ）表示波的波长。

list.abstract: WAVE（英[weɪv]，美[weɪv]），英语单词。作动词时，释义为挥手问候；挥手示意；使…呈波形。作名词时，释义为波浪；波涛；挥手的手势。短语搭配为short wave（短波）。例句为“He has no plans to wave to Rick.（他没有计划向瑞克挥手。）” 其不及物动词近义词有roll、rock，及物动词近义词有undulate，名词性近义词有fluctuation、undulation。
WAVE是一种由微软和IBM联合开发的用于音频数字存储的标准，采用RIFF文件格式结构，非常接近于AIFF和IFF格式。 WAVE是录音时用的标准的WINDOWS文件格式，文件的扩展名为“.WAV”，其数据本身的格式为PCM或压缩型。

yingyinNormal.en: The blast wave will incinerate that city into molten metal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冲击波会把整座城市熔成金属。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hey, in seventh grade, I built a cobra wave. You want to do that? Oh, we can come up with a wave speed formula, and see how accurately we can predict the amplitude.
yingyinNormal.zh: 七年级的时候，我做了眼镜蛇波。你想来做这个吗？我们可以想出波速公式，看看我们能多精准地预测它的振幅。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. It's the apparent change in the frequency of a wave caused by relative motion between the source of the wave and the observer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当声源和观察者之间的距离发生变化时，波动的频率也会发生明显变化。

yingyinNormal.en: I would guess a wave-function and then vary its parameters until I found the lowest energy solution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会任意猜测一个基态波函数，通过更改其参数找出能量最低的量子态。

yingyinNormal.en: You hear that? That is her truth, Mr. "I'll Let You Have Her". I win. You suck. I rule all. Mini-wave in celebration of me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听到没有？这是她的真心话，说什么“我把她让给你”！我赢了，你输了，我是决策者，给我来个迷你波浪舞。

yingyinNormal.en: We've been corresponding for years about our mutual interest in gravitational wave signatures of inflatons in the early universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们通信交流了好几年共同感兴趣的早期宇宙中膨胀子的引力波特性。

yingyinNormal.en: We are using it to map brain wave patterns and then converting them into electrical impulses that can be used to control anything from wheelchairs to robots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要用它来测量大脑波动然后把波动转换为电脉冲就能用来操控任何东西啦无论是轮椅还是机械人都行。

yingyinNormal.en: At ten, that big wave hits from over there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后到了10点，巨浪从那儿打过来。

yingyinNormal.en: And then you arrived. Just smile and wave, boys. Smile and wave. And took everything from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后你们来了。同志们，微笑，招手。微笑，招手。你们抢走了我应有的一切 。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to wave my magic wand and turn you into a frog!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在要挥动我的魔法棒啦，然后把你变成青蛙。

yingyinNormal.en: Just wave your arms a little and they fly away, it's not...
yingyinNormal.zh: 就挥挥你的稻草人手，鸽子自然会飞走……

yingyinNormal.en: That's better. I'll wave to you from the finish line, McFly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好看多了。我会在终点等你，迈克弗莱。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, wait, wait, what's on top of that? Wireless web cams. wave hello.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，等等，车顶上是什么？无线网络摄像头，打个招呼。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, when we're in the audience, he doesn't talk to us but he does wave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们坐在观众席，他是没说话，但有跟我们招手。

yingyinNormal.en: Mine stole my newspaper. It's like a crime wave. Pheebs, you got a second? Sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的邻居偷走我的报纸，这简直是犯罪潮，菲比，你有空吗？当然有。

yingyinNormal.en: And every other Saturday, he had to march in a parade and wave flowers at tyrants.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每两周的周六他都得参加游行，为一位暴君欢呼。

yingyinNormal.en: Crime wave in Gotham. Other breaking news: "Water, wet." Did you file the football yet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哥谭市暗流涌动，另一条爆炸新闻是“水是湿的”，你写好橄榄球赛的稿子了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I wasn't there to conduct. Any fucking moron can wave his arms and keep people in tempo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是去指挥的，弱智也会摇摇胳膊控制节奏。

yingyinNormal.en: And then then ten to eleven the wave. What about everything else? Did you guys see anything?
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后10点到11点是巨浪，有没有看到别的攻击？

yingyinNormal.en: I know a way George can make bubbles. Dip the stick in the mixture, then lift it up and wave it around. Bubble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道怎么让乔治可以吹泡泡。先把棍子拿起来 沾一沾，再向四周挥一挥。泡泡！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden occurrence of or increase in a specified phenomenon, feeling, or emotion

examination_example.sentence: But the start-ups represented a new <highlight>wave</highlight> of technology designed from the ground up for the smartphone world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这些初创公司代表了一股为智能手机领域从头开始设计的新技术浪潮。

examination_example.sentence: The responsibility for the latest <highlight>wave</highlight> of strikes rests on the unions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近一波罢工的责任在于工会。

sense_info_list.en: a gesture or signal made by moving one's hand to and fro
the form in which things such as sound, light, and radio signals travel
move to and fro with a swaying or undulating motion while remaining fixed to one point

word_usage.usage: a/the wave of sth.可以直接对应中文的“xx潮”，如a wave of immigrants移民潮。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: “挥动、飘动”，指有形的东西，如“旗帜、树枝”等。
“摆动”，多指物体上端固定，下端摆来摆去。
“振动、颤动”，指短时间内剧烈地摇动，其对象为有形的、具体的物质。
“波动”，指无形的东西，如水平、特性、价格等。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 挥手问候；挥手示意；使…呈波形；卷；飘扬；飘动；挥舞；挥动；挥手（或手中之物）传达；向…挥手示意

sense_info_list.en: the form in which things such as sound, light, and radio signals travel

examination_example.sentence: Since then they have used sound <highlight>waves</highlight> and even satellites to map this massive body of water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从那以后，他们利用声波甚至卫星来绘制这片巨大水域的地图。

examination_example.sentence: Sound <highlight>waves</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 声波。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists first discovered Lake Vostok in the 1970s by using radio <highlight>waves</highlight> that penetrate the ice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪70年代，科学家们利用穿透冰层的无线电波首次发现了沃斯托克湖。

sense_info_list.en: a sudden occurrence of or increase in a specified phenomenon, feeling, or emotion

examination_example.sentence: A shock <highlight>wave</highlight> shoots through your whole system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冲击波会穿透你的整个身体。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>wave</highlight> of new laws in Europe will definitely put more pressure on law makers to reduce food waste here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欧洲的这波新法律浪潮肯定会给立法者带来更大的压力，让他们减少食物浪费。

examination_example.sentence: These 18-hour cities are beginning to make <highlight>waves</highlight> in real estate rankings and attract more real estate investment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些18小时车程的城市开始在房地产排名上掀起波澜，吸引更多的房地产投资。

sense_info_list.en: a gesture or signal made by moving one's hand to and fro

examination_example.sentence: Place your palm downward and make an inconspicuous <highlight>waving</highlight> gesture, which will produce instant and sacrificing results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 手掌向下，做出一个不显眼的挥手姿势，这将立即产生牺牲性的结果。

examination_example.sentence: The world has witnessed the destructive power of typhoons in the Philippines, and the destructive sea <highlight>waves</highlight> that struck Samoa and neighboring islands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界目睹了台风在菲律宾的破坏力，以及袭击萨摩亚和邻近岛屿的破坏性海浪。

sense_info_list.en: move to and fro with a swaying or undulating motion while remaining fixed to one point

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 挥手问候；挥手示意；使…呈波形；卷；飘扬；飘动；挥舞；挥动；挥手（或手中之物）传达；向…挥手示意

sense_info_list.en: a gesture or signal made by moving one's hand to and fro

examination_example.sentence: It was a major "Ah-ha!" moment, and a <highlight>wave</highlight> of other manufacturers jumped on board to capitalize on new TV shows and movies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个重大的“啊哈!”的时刻，一波又一波的其他制造商纷纷加入，以利用新的电视节目和电影。

examination_example.sentence: Firsthand accounts seem to indicate a small <highlight>wave</highlight> of people bringing piles of donation bags to used goods stores.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据第一手资料显示，有一小批人把一堆堆的捐赠袋带到二手商店。

sense_info_list.en: the form in which things such as sound; light; and radio signals travel
a sudden occurrence of or increase in a specified phenomenon; feeling; or emotion
move to and fro with a swaying or undulating motion while remaining fixed to one point

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 挥手问候；挥手示意；使…呈波形；卷；飘扬；飘动；挥舞；挥动；挥手（或手中之物）传达；向…挥手示意

examination_example.sentence: At the beginning of the year, the artist built a piece called "Strawpocalypse", a pair of 10-foot-tall plastic <highlight>waves</highlight>, frozen mid-crash.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年初，这位艺术家制作了一件名为“吸管末日”（Strawpocalypse）的作品，这是一对10英尺高的塑料波，在撞击过程中冻结。

examination_example.sentence: Little kids and the elderly are the ones who have suffered the most from this extreme heat <highlight>wave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小孩子和老人是受极端热浪影响最大的人群。

sense_info_list.en: a gesture or signal made by moving one's hand to and fro

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 挥手问候；挥手示意；使…呈波形；卷；飘扬；飘动；挥舞；挥动；挥手（或手中之物）传达；向…挥手示意

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes ocean life can be seen in the <highlight>wave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时可以在海浪中看到海洋生物。

examination_example.sentence: This allows scientists to find out the height of a <highlight>wave</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使科学家能够找出波浪的高度。

examination_example.sentence: As they pushed forward, however, the ship experienced small <highlight>waves</highlight>, and then bigger ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，当他们向前推进时，船经历了小波浪，然后是更大的波浪。

examination_example.sentence: The study was done using equipment to track and record brain <highlight>wave</highlight> activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究是使用跟踪和记录脑电波活动的设备完成的。

examination_example.sentence: Special machines were used to follow and record brain <highlight>wave</highlight> activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用特殊机器跟踪和记录脑电波活动。

examination_example.sentence: Many objects in the universe are invisible, but they send radio <highlight>waves</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宇宙中的许多物体是看不见的，但它们会发射无线电波。

sense_info_list.en: a gesture or signal made by moving one's hand to and fro

examination_example.sentence: He has no plans to <highlight>wave</highlight> to Rick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有计划向瑞克挥手。

examination_example.sentence: The elephant <highlight>waved</highlight> it away with his long ears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大象用它的长耳朵挥了挥手。

examination_example.sentence: As I <highlight>waved</highlight> goodbye to the old man.I could see him standing there with a thankful smile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我向老人挥手告别时，我看到他站在那里，带着感激的微笑。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly, a <highlight>wave</highlight> of laughter flew through the air.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然，一阵笑声从空中掠过。

examination_example.sentence: A drama has made the first appearance on social media platforms abroad already, causing a <highlight>wave</highlight> of discussion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一部剧已经在国外社交媒体平台上首次亮相，引发热议。

examination_example.sentence: 30,000 to 50,000 persons died in Europe in 2003 due to the heat <highlight>wave</highlight> there.
